hypothesis_content.title: Intraday V-WAP Reversion with Volume Spike
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC price on 15-minute chart moves >1.8% away from the session's Volume-Weighted Average Price (VWAP, calculated from 00:00 UTC) on a spike in volume (>150% of 20-period average), and the move occurs during London or NY overlap hours (12:00-17:00 UTC), price will revert toward VWAP within 2 hours with >58% probability, regardless of regime.
hypothesis_content.rationale: VWAP acts as a magnet during high-liquidity hours. Volume spikes often indicate emotional or algorithmic overreaction. Institutional flows around London/NY overlap increase likelihood of professional mean reversion trading.
entry_conditions: BTC 15min price >1.8% away from daily VWAP (calculated from 00:00 UTC)
Enter on close of the 15min candle triggering condition

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price returns to within 0.3% of VWAP
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price extends to >2.5% away from VWAP

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Probability of reversion to within 0.5% of VWAP within 2 hours < 50% in STRESS regimes, or < 53% in other regimes.
